Name: Regal Vista Co Living
Comments: Router Placement was not giving range in some rooms. Every floor has a huge lobby and pool table on the ground floor.

Name: SGS Elite Luxury PG for Mens
Comments: Wifi is good. Rooms are small but a good budget-friendly option.

Name: Mourya Gents PG
Comments: Nothing major. Few rooms have balconies that cost 8k, rooms without a balcony cost 7.5k.

Name: Tarun sai mens deluxe hostel
Comments: It’s kinda mass, don’t recommend at all.

Name: GR Grand-2 Womens Stay
Comments: GYM included.

Name: Agasthya Executive PG for Boyz & Men
Comments: Pros: Decent Wi-Fi, good security, great location (10-min walk to Metro), tasty veg food. Can cook your own veg meals. Cons: Only one bathroom and one washing machine for the entire hostel.

Name: New Leo Grand PG
Comments: Free wifi, some indoor games, close to masjidbanda. PG itself was very neat and clean.

Name: Safe Nest Co-Living & Mens PG hostel
KARTHIKEYA DELUXE MENS PG
Comments: Good maintenance, great ventilation.

Name: IT living premium stays
Comments: wifi speed is okay, the place is very near to keka, deloitte and other major mnc's well that's the only perk i see for the place.

Name: TIRUMALA MENS PG ACCOMODATIONS
Comments: Wifi connectivity is good, food is average, near to public transport.

Name: SP Grand Men PG
Comments: Very close to metro and e-galleria mall. Food is not great. Some rooms are big and some are avg for the same rent.

Name: Lavish Livings colive
Comments: Cons: Just that the mobile signals are not good.

Name: B.S. Boys Hostel (myneni appartments)
Comments: Near to Begumpet metro.

Name: Happy homes 3rd branch
Comments: Wi-Fi is way good that's the only reason I'm here.

Name: sri krishna varahi boys hostel
Comments: wifi speed is good, food is okay, its just 100 meters to durgam cheruvu metro.

Name: Ayaan Dev Women PG
Comments: Breakfast is south indian, lunch is rice with some curry or dal, dinner has chapati curry rice. Near 'indian bazar home appliance'.

Name: Venkateswara Hostels
Comments: Food hygiene is slightly below average. Wifi works fine. Security is passable. Fridges on every floor; three washing machines. 4 sharing is too cramped. Had cockroach and bed bug issues.

Name: Elite hostel for men
Comments: Very close to chaitanyapuri metro station (<100m).

Name: Regal Vistas CoLiving
Comments: Food is Good, Zepto warehouse is just beside. Only con is - only Airtel has good signal.

Name: Exotica - Premium Living for Women
Comments: Single share also available. Pros: Gym & Play Area, Lounge Area, Self Kitchen in Cafeteria, Fingerprint/Access Card Security. Cons: Sometimes Wi-Fi speed can be slow.

Name: Sri Kanaka Durga Luxury Men's PG
Comments: CCTV, Television, Good wifi speed, Nearby JNTU metro.

Name: Vihari grand coliving
Comments: Located in Ayyappa society, great locality. Transport available. Food is okayish. Rooms are spacious. Gym is available.

Name: Stanza Living Lublin House
Comments: House maintenance is horrible. You have to do your own cleaning due to lack of workers and reckless management. The only option for students in nearby colleges.

Name: Regal Vista Co Living
Comments: Lunch is fixed (daal chawal). Rent is for NON-AC. For AC, it's 30k. Close to 100ft road with many eateries. Huge common space. Good Wifi.

Name: Urban Castle (Alpha) Mens PG
Comments: Good Wifi speed and food is good most of the times. Thick buttermilk provided.
